statements: SELECT brand_id, influencer_id, comment, sentiment, reputation FROM brand_influencer_sentiment;
SELECT comment, reputation, influencer_id, sentiment, brand_id FROM brand_influencer_sentiment;
SELECT brand_id, influencer_id FROM brand_influencer_sentiment;
SELECT reputation, sentiment FROM brand_influencer_sentiment;
SELECT comment FROM brand_influencer_sentiment;
SELECT brand_id, influencer_id, sentiment, reputation FROM brand_influencer_sentiment WHERE sentiment = 'positive' ORDER BY reputation DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, reputation FROM brand_influencer_sentiment WHERE comment LIKE '%amazing%' ORDER BY influencer_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT influencer_id, sentiment, reputation FROM brand_influencer_sentiment WHERE reputation > 80 ORDER BY sentiment DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT brand_id, influencer_id, sentiment, reputation FROM brand_influencer_sentiment WHERE sentiment = 'negative' ORDER BY reputation ASC LIMIT 7
SELECT brand_id, influencer_id, comment FROM brand_influencer_sentiment WHERE sentiment = 'neutral' ORDER BY influencer_id ASC LIMIT 4
SELECT * FROM Brands;
SELECT brand_id, brand_name FROM Brands ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerSentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(sentiment_id) AS sentiment_count FROM InfluencerSentiment GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT * FROM Brands WHERE industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE brand_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM InfluencerSentiment;
SELECT influencer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM InfluencerSentiment GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 4;
SELECT * FROM influencer_sentiment;
SELECT influencer_id, sentiment_score FROM influencer_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT brand_id, feedback FROM brand_reputation ORDER BY reputation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM brand_tracking WHERE tracking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT brand_id, influencer_id, tracking_result FROM brand_tracking WHERE tracking_result='Positive' ORDER BY brand_id ASC, influencer_id DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, sentiment_score, comment FROM influencer_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT brand_id, reputation_score, feedback FROM brand_reputation WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY brand_id;
SELECT brand_id, reputation_score, feedback FROM brand_reputation INNER JOIN brand_tracking ON brand_reputation.brand_id = brand_tracking.brand_id WHERE tracking_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM influencer_sentiment GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT b.brand_id, b.reputation_score, b.feedback, i.influencer_id, i.sentiment_score, i.comment FROM brand_reputation AS b JOIN brand_tracking AS bt ON b.brand_id = bt.brand_id JOIN influencer_sentiment AS i ON bt.influencer_id = i.influencer_id WHERE b.reputation_score > 0.7 AND i.sentiment_score < 0.4;
SELECT * FROM Brands;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE brand_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM Brands;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT brand_name, industry, COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM Brands INNER JOIN Comments ON Brands.brand_id = Comments.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name, industry;

SELECT Influencers.influencer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Influencers INNER JOIN Feedback ON Influencers.influencer_id = Feedback.influencer_id GROUP BY Influencers.influencer_name ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM influencer_data;
SELECT sentiment_score, comment FROM influencer_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT brand_id, location FROM brand_data ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, sentiment_score, comment FROM influencer_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM influencer_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT influencer_id, sentiment_score FROM influencer_sentiment;
SELECT brand_id, influencer_id, comment, feedback FROM brand_monitoring WHERE influencer_id = 1001;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM influencer_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT brand_id, name, industry, location FROM brand_data ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_reputation WHERE reputation_score > 4.5;
